import React, { useState } from 'react' import Modal from './Modal' import { Bell, CalendarDay, Clock, Journals, Palette, X } from 'react-bootstrap-icons' import { DatePicker, TimePicker, MuiPickersUtilsProvider } from '@material-ui/pickers' import DateFnsUtils from '@date-io/date-fns' function BookForm({ handleSubmit, heading = false, text, setText, author, setAuthor, day, setDay, time, setTime, categories, showButtons = false, setShowModal = false }) { return (
{ heading &&

{heading}

} setText(e.target.value)} placeholder="Title" autoFocus /> setAuthor(e.target.value)} placeholder="Author" />

Remind Me!

setDay(day)} />
setTime(time)} />

Choose a category

{ categories.map(category =>
{category.name}
) }
{ showButtons &&
setShowModal(false)} >
}
) } export default BookForm
